TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Hulam, title = Hulam, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hulam} }

S.FORM: Hulam (kamu nu Hulam: 漢人 ) mahiza u layak ku tademaw, u lalangaw ku tademew. nay Chinaay a tademaw. caay ka u yuan-cu-ming (binacadan).
Holam (kamo no Holam: 漢人 ) mahiza o layak ko tademaw, o lalangaw ko tademew. nay Chinaay a tademaw. caay ka o yoan-co-ming (binacadan).
